Question Number 16:

write the max sub array function that takes in non-empty array of integers and returns the max sum that can be obtained by summing up all the numbers in a non-empty subarray of the input array. A subarray must only contain adjacent numbers.

Sample input: [3,5,-9,1,3,-2,3,4,7,2,-9,6,3,1,-5,4]
Sample output: 19([1,3,-2,3,4,7,2,-9,6,3,1])

please export you function at the end: module.exports = yourFunction
